TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemUpdateReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the reason that a cached item is being removed from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unlike the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason> enumeration, this enumeration does not include the `Removed` or `Underused` values. Updateable cache items are not removable and can thus never be automatically removed by ASP.NET even if there is a need to free memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemUpdateReason DependencyChanged = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the item is being removed from the cache because the associated object changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemUpdateReason Expired = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the item is being removed from the cache because the absolute or sliding expiration interval expired.
